name: morpho-blue-oracles
description: Morpho Blue Oracles are contracts that can be used as oracles for markets on [Morpho Blue](https://github.com/morpho-org/morpho-blue). The oracles implement the `IOracle` interface defined in [`IOracle.sol`](https://github.com/morpho-org/morpho-blue/blob/main/src/interfaces/IOracle.sol#L9): they return the price of 1 asset of collateral token quoted in 1 asset of loan token.
